attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let us live our lives the way we want to without dictating to us which light bulbs we use, what we put in our bins, which mode of transport we use, let us have our own opinions, let us walk the streets in safety, just BACK OFF BIG BROTHER.

rejection.details: The title must be a specific call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
